name: GREENSWAEN® GOLD CLASSIC
description: GREENSWAEN® GOLD CLASSIC is a type of caramel malt. Intensifies the beer’s body and its smoothness, promotes head formation and retention and creates soft toffee notes in the beer aroma. By the special production procedure GreenSwaen©Gold Classic has a reddish shine and a typical aroma which serves to intensify and stabilize the flavor. It is used in dark festival beers, nutrient beers and brings a darker golden hue to your beer.
